the-chairman.title: The chairman
the-chairman.text: Mr. Moneybag`s himself, the artist who created CCC. I'll steal your kidneys and feed them to your mother for fun.

the-ceo.title: The CEO
the-ceo.text: Code monkey extraordinaire, let's get technical. I'd kill a baby just to make sure adrenochrome wasn't a real thing.

the-president.title: The President
the-president.text: Able to use Twitter. What's all this hoopla about "human rights"?

the-director.title: The Director
the-director.text: In charge of just about everything else. We really should bring back child labor.
